import { useContext } from "react" import { ApiContext } from "../../context/ApiContext" const JobsList = () => { const { userInfo } = useContext(ApiContext) const users = userInfo ? userInfo.map((user) => { return (

{user.name}

asd

asd

{user.description}

) }) :null; return (
{ users }
) } export default JobsList
